name: Channelogue
description:
Made by Team Magic:

Gwen Lloyd-Wiggins, Tom Slade , Eilidh MacLeod, Natalia Sionek, Natalie Clayton

***Winner of 1st Abertay GDS Jam 2015 :D ***

Isometric puzzle game - Stick to the same colour in full colour mode, stick to the same pattern when the game glitches to greyscale

WASD to move

Spacebar to pause
